QuestData.Title: There's Somebody Out There Who Wants It
QuestData.Description: So, while you're already all sweaty from doing all that other stuff, I was thinking I might grab you for one more task. You don't mind, do you?$b$bThe latest Science and Explosions journal just came in from Bilgewater Harbor, and there's this article about this hot new reagent. Prices on the reagent are skyrocketing, and we're in prime position to capitalize!$b$b<Sassy leans over and whispers the details into your ear.>$b$bYou got that? Good. You can find the basilisks in a cave, far to the east.
QuestData.LogDescription: Obtain 7 of Sassy's Secret Ingredient from Thrashtail and Ironjaw Basilisks in the Crystalvein Mine.
QuestData.CompletionText: I hope you used the extraction procedure we discussed.
QuestData.RewardText: Great! These look... disgusting. But probably pretty valuable. Let's get to splitting these up. Some for me, some for Jasper, some for Chabal...
